snippet: The Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center offered a lithe performance of Gallo’s Trio Sonata as part of its annual Baroque Festival.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center performance, part of Baroque Festival, at Alice Tully Hall.
